value: S tem pooblaščam in zahtevam, da %{merchant_name} bremeni sredstva z mojega (našega) računa pri navedeni finančni instituciji in sredstva knjiži v dobro. Pooblaščam %{merchant_name} za izvajanje vseh potrebnih ukrepov za odpravo morebitnih napak.
reference value: I (We) hereby authorize and request %{merchant_name} to debit funds from my (our) account at the Financial Institution indicated, and credit the funds. I (we) authorize %{merchant_name} to take any and all action required to correct any errors.

value: S klikom na spodnji gumb potrjujete, da so podatki, ki ste jih navedli v tej pogodbi o odobritvi bremenitve ACH za neposredna plačila, popolni, resnični in predloženi za zgoraj izbrani namen. Veljati bo veljalo, dokler ne (smo) obvestili %{merchant_name}, da (to) želimo preklicati to pooblastilo tako, da se obrnemo na %{merchant_email} ali %{merchant_phone}.
reference value: By clicking the button below, you certify that the information you have given on this ACH Debit Authorization Agreement for Direct Payments is complete, true, and submitted for the purpose selected above. It will remain in effect until I (we) notify %{merchant_name} that I (we) wish to revoke this authorization by contacting %{merchant_email} or %{merchant_phone}.
description: By clicking the button below, you certify that the information you have given on this ACH Debit Authorization Agreement for Direct Payments is complete, true, and submitted for the purpose selected above.  It will remain in effect until I (we) notify Chargebee that I (we) wish to revoke this authorization by contacting sam@example.com or 9898982345.
